dialogue.speaker: archivist-lumina
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be our new Assistant Archivist! I am Lumina, Senior Archivist of Interdimensional Collections.

dialogue.speaker: keeper-valdris
dialogue.text: Welcome, young seeker. I am Valdris, Keeper of the Ancient Texts. Your arrival has been long anticipated.

dialogue.speaker: archivist-lumina
dialogue.text: The knowledge constructs await your attention. Each one contains scattered words that, when properly organized, reveal wisdom from across the multiverse.

dialogue.speaker: keeper-valdris
dialogue.text: Do not be overwhelmed by the vastness of what lies before you. Every master archivist began with a single word, a single pattern recognized.
